trans-unit.source: Hook to ‘wpmu_activate_user’ or ‘wpmu_activate_blog’ for events that should happen only when users or sites are self-created (since those actions are not called when users and sites are created by a Super Admin).
trans-unit.target: 挂钩“ wpmu_activate_user”或“ wpmu_activate_blog”以获取仅在自行创建用户或网站时才发生的事件（因为在由超级管理员创建用户和网站时不会调用这些操作）。

trans-unit.source: Hook to schedule pings and enclosures when a post is published.
trans-unit.target: 钩子,以便在帖子发布时安排打赏和围观。

trans-unit.source: Hook to this filter to see if it will cause a hierarchy loop.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩到这个过滤器上,看是否会引起层次循环。

trans-unit.source: Hook used to schedule publication for a post marked for the future.
trans-unit.target: 钩子用于安排发表标明将来的职位。

trans-unit.target: 钩子函数可以接受额外的参数,这些参数是在匹配的

trans-unit.source: How long the connection should stay open in seconds. Default 5.
trans-unit.target: 连接打开的时间,以秒为单位。默认值为5。

trans-unit.source: How many levels of the hierarchy are to be included. 0 means all. Default 0.

trans-unit.source: How many levels of the hierarchy are to be included. 0 means all. Default 0. Default 0.

trans-unit.target: 列表的开始和结束边缘有多少个数字。默认为1。

trans-unit.source: How many numbers to either side of the current pages. Default 2.
trans-unit.target: 当前页面两边有多少个数字。默认为2。

trans-unit.source: How often the event should subsequently recur.
trans-unit.target: 该事件随后应多长时间发生一次。

trans-unit.source: How the list items should be wrapped. Default is a ul with an id and class. Uses printf() format with numbered placeholders.

trans-unit.source: How the list items should be wrapped. Uses printf() format with numbered placeholders. Default is a ul with an id and class.
How to format the comments list. Accepts 'html5', 'xhtml'. Default 'html5' if the theme supports it.
How to format the comments list. Default 'html5' if the theme supports it. Accepts 'html5', 'xhtml'.
trans-unit.target: 如何格式化评论列表。如果主题支持,默认为'html5'。接受'html5','xhtml'。

trans-unit.source: How to order nav menu items as queried with get_posts(). Will be ignored if 'output' is ARRAY_A. Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何使用get_posts（）查询订购的导航菜单项。如果“输出”为ARRAY_A，则将被忽略。默认为“ ASC”。

trans-unit.source: How to order outputted menu items. Default ARRAY_A.
trans-unit.target: 如何对输出的菜单项目进行排序。默认ARRAY_A。

trans-unit.source: How to order retrieved comments. Accepts 'ASC', 'DESC'. Default: 'DESC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对检索到的评论进行排序。接受'ASC','DESC'。默认值:'DESC'。

trans-unit.source: How to order retrieved networks. Accepts 'ASC', 'DESC'. Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对检索到的网络进行排序。接受'ASC','DESC'。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to order retrieved sites. Accepts 'ASC', 'DESC'. Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对检索到的网站进行排序。接受'ASC','DESC'。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to order the bookmark category based on term scheme if $categorize is true. Default 'name'.
trans-unit.target: 如果$categorize为真,如何根据术语方案来排列书签类别。默认为'name'。

trans-unit.source: How to order the links by. Accepts 'id', 'link_id', 'name', 'link_name', 'url', 'link_url', 'visible', 'link_visible', 'rating', 'link_rating', 'owner', 'link_owner', 'updated', 'link_updated', 'notes', 'link_notes', 'description', 'link_description', 'length' and 'rand'. When $orderby is 'length', orders by the character length of 'link_name'. Default 'name'.
How to order the links by. Accepts post fields. Default 'name'.
trans-unit.target: 如何按链接排序。接受帖子字段。默认为'name'。

trans-unit.source: How to order the tags. Accepts 'ASC' (ascending), 'DESC' (descending), or 'RAND' (random). Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何排序标签。接受'ASC'(升序)、'DESC'(降序)或'RAND'(随机)。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to sort retrieved pages. Accepts 'ASC', 'DESC'. Default 'ASC'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对检索到的页面进行排序。接受'ASC','DESC'。默认为'ASC'。

trans-unit.source: How to sort the authors. Accepts 'nicename', 'email', 'url', 'registered', 'user_nicename', 'user_email', 'user_url', 'user_registered', 'name', 'display_name', 'post_count', 'ID', 'meta_value', 'user_login'. Default 'name'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对作者进行排序。接受'nicename','email','url','registered','user_nicename','user_email','user_url','user_registered','name','display_name','post_count','ID','meta_value','user_login'.默认为'name'。

trans-unit.source: How to sort the list of pages. Accepts post column names. Default 'menu_order, post_title'.
trans-unit.target: 如何对页面列表进行排序。接受帖子的列名,默认为'menu_order,post_title'。默认为'menu_order,post_title'。

trans-unit.source: However, if needed, you can always set the options yourself:
trans-unit.target: 不过,如果需要,你可以随时自己设置选项。

trans-unit.source: Icon URL of the attachment (e.g. /wp-includes/images/media/archive.png).
Ideally, call this function immediately after the body tag is opened. This prevents a flash of unstyled content.
trans-unit.target: 理想的情况是,在打开body标签后立即调用这个函数。这样可以防止未定型内容的闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the network and site of a requested domain and path and populates the corresponding network and site global objects as part of the multisite bootstrap process.
trans-unit.target: 识别请求的域和路径的网络和站点,并填充相应的网络和站点全局对象,作为多站点引导过程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Identify an existing table alias that is compatible with the current query clause.
trans-unit.target: 确定一个与当前查询子句兼容的现有表别名。

trans-unit.source: Identify descendants of a given page ID in a list of page objects.
trans-unit.target: 在页面对象列表中识别给定页面ID的后裔。

trans-unit.source: If
trans-unit.target: If

trans-unit.source: If $allow_bail is false, the lack of database connection will need to be handled manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果$allow_bail为false,则需要手动处理数据库连接的缺失。

trans-unit.source: If $check_urls is empty, look for the rss feed url found in the dashboard widget options of $widget_id. If cached, call $callback, a function that echoes out output for this widget. If not cache, echo a "Loading…" stub which is later replaced by Ajax call (see top of /wp-admin/index.php)
trans-unit.target: 如果$ check_urls为空，请在$ widget_id的仪表板小部件选项中查找rss feed URL。如果已缓存，请调用$ callback，此函数会回显此小部件的输出。如果没有缓存，则回显一个“ Loading…”存根，稍后将其替换为Ajax调用（请参见/wp-admin/index.php的顶部）

trans-unit.source: If $data is not an string, then returned value will always be false. Serialized data is always a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果$data不是字符串,那么返回的值将总是false。序列化的数据总是一个字符串,如果$data不是字符串,那么返回的值将总是false。

trans-unit.source: If $file_path is a writable filename, this will do a GET request and write the file to that path.
trans-unit.target: 如果$file_path是一个可写的文件名,这将做一个GET请求并将文件写入该路径。

trans-unit.source: If $gmt is set to either ‘1’ or ‘true’, then both types will use GMT time. if $gmt is false, the output is adjusted with the GMT offset in the WordPress option.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ gmt设置为'1'或'true'，则两种类型都将使用GMT时间。如果$ gmt为false，则使用WordPress选项中的GMT偏移量调整输出。

trans-unit.source: If $translate is true then the given date and format string will be passed to date_i18n() for translation.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ translate为true，则给定的日期和格式字符串将传递给date_i18n（）进行翻译。

trans-unit.source: If $type is ‘delete’, the classes are ‘button delete’.

If $user_id is not a number, then the function will fail over with a ‘false’ boolean return value. Other returned values depend on whether there is only one item to be returned, which be that single item type. If there is more than one metadata value, then it will be list of metadata values.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ user_id不是数字，则该函数将使用“ false”布尔值返回值进行故障转移。其他返回值取决于是否只有一个项目要返回，即单个项目类型。如果有多个元数据值，那么它将是元数据值列表。

trans-unit.source: If $value does not exist, the return value will be false. If $taxonomy exists and $field and $value combinations exist, the Term will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果$value不存在,返回值将为false。如果$taxonomy存在,并且$field和$value的组合存在,那么将返回Term。

trans-unit.source: If ‘
If ‘rtl’, an addtional stylesheet will be loaded, allowing custom styling targeting right-to-left.
If 'list', each author is wrapped in an <li> element, otherwise the authors will be separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 如果为“ list”，则每个作者都包裹在 <li> 元素中，否则，作者之间将以逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: If switch_to_blog() was called after the preview() method, and the current site is now not the same site, then this method does a no-op and returns the original value.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Preview（）方法之后调用了switch_to_blog（），并且当前站点现在不是同一站点，则此方法不执行操作并返回原始值。

trans-unit.source: If do_blocks() needs to remove wpautop() from the the_content filter, this re-adds it afterwards, for subsequent the_content usage.
trans-unit.target: 如果do_blocks（）需要从 the_content 过滤器中删除wpautop（），则此后将其重新添加，以用于随后的 the_content 用法。

trans-unit.source: If wp_is_large_network() returns
trans-unit.target: 如果wp_is_large_network（）返回

trans-unit.source: If $action is ‘query_plugins’ or ‘plugin_information’, an object MUST be passed. If $action is ‘hot_tags’ or ‘hot_categories’, an array should be passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $action 是'query_plugins'或'plugin_information'，则必须传递一个对象。如果 $action 是'hot_tags'或'hot_categories'，则应传递一个数组。

trans-unit.source: If $action is ‘query_themes’, ‘theme_information’, or ‘feature_list’, an object MUST be passed. If $action is ‘hot_tags’, an array should be passed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $action 为'query_themes'，'theme_information'或'feature_list'，则必须传递一个对象。如果 $action 为'hot_tags'，则应传递一个数组。

trans-unit.source: If $args['settings'] is not defined, use the $id as the setting ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义 $args['settings'] ，请使用$ id作为设置ID。

trans-unit.source: If $code is empty, the other parameters will be ignored. When $code is not empty, $message will be used even if it is empty. The $data parameter will be used only if it is not empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $code 为空，则其他参数将被忽略。当 $code 不为空时，将使用 $message 即使它为空。在 $data 参数将只用于如果不是空的。

trans-unit.source: If $data is an instance of Requests_Response, uses the status code from it. Otherwise, sets as 0
trans-unit.target: 如果 $data 是Requests_Response的实例，则使用其中的状态代码。否则设置为0

trans-unit.source: If $mode equals ‘excerpt’, the published time and date are both displayed. If $mode equals ‘list’ (default), the publish date is displayed, with the time and date together available as an abbreviation definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $mode 等于“摘录”，则显示发布的时间和日期。如果 $mode 等于“ list”（默认值），则显示发布日期，同时将时间和日期作为缩写定义可用。

trans-unit.source: If $name matches a post field, the comment post will be loaded and the post’s value checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $name 与帖子字段匹配，则将加载评论帖子并检查帖子的值。

trans-unit.source: If $name matches a post field, the comment post will be loaded and the post’s value returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $name 与帖子字段匹配，则将加载评论帖子，并返回该帖子的值。

trans-unit.source: If $terms is an array of objects, then _get_term_children() returns an array of objects. If $terms is an array of IDs, then _get_term_children() returns an array of IDs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 $terms 是一个对象数组，则_get_term_children（）返回一个对象数组。如果 $terms 是ID数组，则_get_term_children（）返回ID数组。

trans-unit.source: If $title is empty and $fallback_title is set, the latter will be used.
If $translate is true then the given date and format string will be passed to wp_date() for translation.
If 'page' == get_option( 'show_on_front' ):
trans-unit.target: 如果 'page' == get_option( 'show_on_front' ) ：

trans-unit.source: If 'posts' == get_option( 'show_on_front' ):
trans-unit.target: 如果 'posts' == get_option( 'show_on_front' ) ：

trans-unit.source: If <var>$feed</var> is true, extra rewrite rules will be generated for obtaining a feed of the current page, and if <var>$forcomments</var> is true, this will be a comment feed.
If <var>$page</var> is true, an extra rewrite rule will be generated for accessing different pages (e.g. /category/tech/page/2 points to the second page of the ‘tech’ category archive).

If <var>$walk_dirs</var> is true, then a rewrite rule will be generated for each directory of the structure provided, e.g. if you provide it with ‘/%year%/%month%/%day/’, rewrite rules will be generated for ‘/%year%/’, /%year%/%month%/’ and ‘/%year%/%month%/%day%/’.
If Multisite is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了多站点。

trans-unit.source: If Trash is disabled, comment is permanently deleted.
If Trash is disabled, the post or page is permanently deleted.
If a blog is marked as not being public then the noindex meta tag will be output to tell web robots not to index the page content. Add this to the ‘wp_head’ action.
trans-unit.target: 如果博客被标记为不公开，则将输出noindex元标记以告诉Web机器人不要对页面内容进行索引。将此添加到“ wp_head”操作中。

trans-unit.source: If a child theme is used, both the current child and parent theme directories are tested and both the files with the same relative path are linked with this single call if they are found.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用子主题,则对当前的子主题和父主题目录都进行测试,如果发现有相同相对路径的文件,都会用这个单次调用进行链接。

trans-unit.source: If a directory and $recursive is true, contains another array of files.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个目录且$recursive为true,则包含另一个文件数组。

trans-unit.source: If a dynamic block is added to this list, it must not generate another excerpt, as this will cause an infinite loop to occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个动态块被添加到这个列表中,就不能再生成另一个摘录,因为这会导致一个无限循环的发生。

trans-unit.source: If a falsey value is returned instead of an object, the menu items meta box for the current meta box object will not be added.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回一个falsey值而不是一个对象,则不会添加当前元盒对象的菜单项元盒。

trans-unit.source: If a falsey value is returned, no stylesheet will be used and the "raw" XML of the sitemap index will be displayed.
If a falsey value is returned, no stylesheet will be used and the "raw" XML of the sitemap will be displayed.

If a file exists in the wp-content directory named db-error.php, then it will be loaded instead of displaying the WordPress DB error. If it is not found, then the WordPress DB error will be displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果在wp-content目录中存在名为db-error.php的文件,那么它将被加载,而不是显示WordPress DB错误。如果它不存在,则会显示WordPress DB错误。

trans-unit.source: If a network and site are found, a true response will be returned so that the request can continue.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到网络和站点，则将返回 true 响应，以便请求可以继续。

trans-unit.source: If a non-empty string is passed, the filter is evaluated on the wp_richedit_pre() return after being formatted.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了非空字符串，则在格式化后对wp_richedit_pre（）返回值求值。

trans-unit.source: If a non-null value is passed to the filter, moving the file and any related error reporting will be completely skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给过滤器一个非空值,移动文件和任何相关的错误报告将被完全跳过。

trans-unit.source: If a non-null value is returned from the filter, moving the file and any related error reporting will be completely skipped.

If a parent field is passed in, the presence of any nested field within that parent will cause the method to return true. For example "title" will return true if any of title, title.raw or title.rendered is provided.
If a plugin is silently activated (such as during an update), this hook does not fire.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个插件被静静地激活了(比如在更新期间),这个钩子就不会启动。

trans-unit.source: If a plugin is silently deactivated (such as during an update), this hook does not fire.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个插件被静静地停用(比如在更新期间),这个钩子不会启动。

trans-unit.source: If a post/page was saved, then output JavaScript to make an Ajax request that will call WP_Embed::cache_oembed().
trans-unit.target: 如果保存了帖子/页面，则输出JavaScript发出Ajax请求，该请求将调用WP_Embed :: cache_oembed（）。

trans-unit.source: If a post/page was saved, then output JavaScript to make an Ajax request that will call WP_Embed::cache_oembed().
trans-unit.target: 如果保存了帖子/页面，则输出JavaScript发出Ajax请求，该请求将调用WP_Embed :: cache_oembed（）。

trans-unit.source: If a redirect was provided and a functions.php file was found, we first ensure that functions.php file does not throw fatal errors anymore.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了重定向,并且发现了一个functions.php文件,我们首先要确保functions.php文件不会再抛出致命错误。

trans-unit.source: If a redirect was provided, we first ensure the plugin does not throw fatal errors anymore.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了重定向,我们首先确保插件不会再抛出致命的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a registered image size is removed from functions.php, then any image uploaded before that point and then deleted from the media library afterwards, does not have those auto-generated sizes deleted too. Only image sizes that exist in functions.php are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果从function.php中删除了注册的图片大小,那么在该点之前上传的图片和之后从媒体库中删除的图片不会被自动生成的大小也被删除。只有存在于function.php中的图片尺寸才会被删除。

trans-unit.source: If a static page is set for the front page of the site, this function will return true only on the page you set as the "Posts page".
trans-unit.target: 如果网站首页设置了静态页面,那么只有在您设置为 "帖子页面 "的页面上,这个函数才会返回true。

trans-unit.source: If a table only contains utf8 or utf8mb4 columns, convert it to utf8mb4.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表只包含utf8或utf8mb4列,将其转换为utf8mb4。

trans-unit.source: If a transient exists, this function will update the transient’s expiration time.

If a user does not belong to any site, the global user dashboard is used. If the user belongs to the current site, the dashboard for the current site is returned. If the user cannot edit the current site, the dashboard to the user’s primary site is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户不属于任何站点，则使用全局用户仪表板。如果用户属于当前站点，则返回当前站点的仪表板。如果用户无法编辑当前站点，则返回用户主站点的仪表板。

trans-unit.source: If a user visits example.com/admin, they’ll be redirected to /wp-admin. Visiting /login redirects to /wp-login.php, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户访问example.com/admin，他们将被重定向到/ wp-admin。访问/ login重定向到/wp-login.php，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: If adding widget options, WP_Widget::update() and WP_Widget::form() should also be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 如果添加窗口小部件选项，则WP_Widget :: update（）和WP_Widget :: form（）也应被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If after enabling pretty permalinks don’t work, fallback to query-string permalinks.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用漂亮的永久链接后仍不起作用，请回退到查询字符串永久链接。

trans-unit.source: If all checks pass, the function will return true.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有检查都通过,函数将返回true。

trans-unit.source: If an Absolute URL is provided, no processing of that URL is done.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供绝对URL,则不对该URL进行处理。

trans-unit.source: If an ID is passed with the categories array that is not associated with a valid category, it will be stripped before the object terms are updated and from the return array.
If an array in the form of array( x_crop_position, y_crop_position ):
trans-unit.target: 如果一个数组的形式为array(x_crop_position,y_crop_position )。

trans-unit.source: If an array is given then it is assumed to be raw header data with numeric keys with the headers as the values. No headers must be passed that were already processed.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定了一个数组,那么它被认为是带有数字键的原始头数据,头数据为值。不能传递已经处理过的头数据。

trans-unit.source: If an array is passed, the array_map() function causes a callback to pass the value back to the function. The slashes from each value will be removed using the stripslashes() function.
If an explicit $ids array is not present, this parameter will determine which attachments are used for the playlist. Default is the current post ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确的$ids数组,这个参数将决定哪些附件用于播放列表。默认是当前的帖子ID。

trans-unit.source: If an object is in more than one of the terms passed to $terms, the results returned will contain duplicate object_ids.

If an object is passed then the comment data will be cached and then returned after being passed through a filter. If the comment is empty, then the global comment variable will be used, if it is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递一个对象,那么注释数据将被缓存,然后通过过滤器后返回。如果注释为空,那么将使用全局注释变量,如果它被设置的话。

trans-unit.source: If an object type does not support any subtypes, such as users or comments, you should commonly call this function without passing a subtype.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个对象类型不支持任何子类型,如用户或注释,通常应该在不传递子类型的情况下调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: If an object-cache.php file exists in the wp-content directory, it uses that drop-in as an external object cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果在wp-content目录下存在object-cache.php文件,则使用该drop-in作为外部对象缓存。

trans-unit.source: If any errors are found or text is outputted, then it will be captured to ensure that the success redirection will update the error redirection.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现有错误,或者有文字输出,那么就会被捕获,以确保成功重定向会更新错误重定向。

trans-unit.source: If any errors are present in $errors, this will abort the password reset request.
If any errors are present in $errors, this will abort the user’s registration.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ errors中出现任何错误，这将中止用户的注册。

trans-unit.source: If any of the currently registered image sub-sizes are missing, create them and update the image meta data.
If any of the settings need to be changed, this can be done with another js file similar to media-upload.js. That file should require array(‘thickbox’) to ensure it is loaded after.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更改任何设置，可以使用类似于media-upload.js的另一个js文件来完成。该文件应要求使用array（'thickbox'）才能确保在以后加载。

trans-unit.source: If assigned, WordPress ignores the pages assigned to display the site front page or the blog posts index
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了,WordPress会忽略指定显示网站首页或博客文章索引的页面。

trans-unit.source: If attempt to register or enqueue an already registered handle with different parameters, the new parameters will be ignored. Instead, use wp_deregister_script() and register the script again with the new parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试使用不同的参数注册或排队已注册的句柄，则新参数将被忽略。而是使用wp_deregister_script（）并使用新参数再次注册脚本。

trans-unit.source: If attempt to register or enqueue an already registered handle with different parameters, the new parameters will be ignored. Instead, use wp_deregister_script() and register the script again with the new parameters.

If changes were just submitted ($_GET[‘settings-updated’]) and settings errors were saved to the ‘settings_errors’ transient then those errors will be returned instead. This is used to pass errors back across pageloads.

trans-unit.source: If the ‘show_all’ argument is set to true, then it will show all of the pages instead of a short list of the pages near the current page. By default, the ‘show_all’ is set to false and controlled by the ‘end_size’ and ‘mid_size’ arguments. The ‘end_size’ argument is how many numbers on either the start and the end list edges, by default is 1. The ‘mid_size’ argument is how many numbers to either side of current page, but not including current page.
trans-unit.target: 如果'show_all'参数设置为true，则它将显示所有页面，而不是当前页面附近的简短页面列表。默认情况下，“ show_all”设置为false，并由“ end_size”和“ mid_size”参数控制。“ end_size”参数是开始和结束列表边缘上有多少个数字，默认值为1。“ mid_size”参数是当前页面的任一侧（不包括当前页面）有多少个数字。

trans-unit.source: If the ‘slug’ argument in $args is missing, then the ‘name’ in $args will be used. It should also be noted that if you set ‘slug’ and it isn’t unique then a WP_Error will be passed back. If you don’t pass any slug, then a unique one will be created for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果$ args中的'slug'参数丢失，则将使用$ args中的'name'。还应注意，如果设置了“ slug”并且它不是唯一的，则WP_Error将被传回。如果您没有传递任何子弹，那么将为您创建一个独特的子弹。

trans-unit.source: If the ‘slug’ argument in $args is missing, then the ‘name’ will be used. If you set ‘slug’ and it isn’t unique, then a WP_Error is returned. If you don’t pass any slug, then a unique one will be created.

trans-unit.source: If the front end and the admin are served from the same domain, load the preview over ssl if the Customizer is being loaded over ssl. This avoids insecure content warnings. This is not attempted if the admin and front end are on different domains to avoid the case where the front end doesn’t have ssl certs. Domain mapping plugins can allow other urls in these conditions using the customize_allowed_urls filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果前端和管理员是从同一个域提供服务的，那么如果通过ssl加载了Customizer，则可以通过ssl加载预览。这样可以避免不安全的内容警告。如果管理员和前端位于不同的域，则不会尝试这样做，以避免前端没有ssl证书的情况。域映射插件可以使用customize_allowed_urls过滤器在这些条件下允许其他URL。

trans-unit.source: If the given parameter key exists in any parameter type an update will take place, otherwise a new param will be created in the first parameter type (respecting get_parameter_order()).

If the handle of a registered script is listed in the $deps array of dependencies of another script that is enqueued with wp_enqueue_script(), that script will be automatically loaded prior to loading the enqueued script. This greatly simplifies the process of ensuring that a script has all the dependencies it needs. See below for a simple example.

trans-unit.source: If the handle of a registered script is listed in the $deps array of dependencies of another script that is enqueued with wp_enqueue_script(), that script will be automatically loaded prior to loading the enqueued script. This greatly simplifies the process of ensuring that a script has all the dependencies it needs. See below for a simple example.
If the header already exists, it will be overwritten
trans-unit.target: 如果头已经存在,它将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: If the header has multiple values, they will be concatenated with a comma as per the HTTP specification. Be aware that some non-compliant headers (notably cookie headers) cannot be joined this way.

trans-unit.source: If the headers are not present in the plugin’s main PHP file, readme.txt is also checked as a fallback.
If the headers are not present in the theme’s stylesheet file, readme.txt is also checked as a fallback.
If the host is not allowed, then the redirect defaults to wp-admin on the siteurl instead. This prevents malicious redirects which redirect to another host, but only used in a few places.
trans-unit.target: 如果主机不被允许,那么重定向默认为siteurl上的wp-admin。这可以防止恶意重定向,重定向到另一个主机,但只在少数地方使用。

trans-unit.source: If the host is not allowed, then the redirect is to $default supplied
trans-unit.target: 如果主机不允许,则重定向到提供的$default。

trans-unit.source: If the length of a string element in the $data array parameter is longer that the defined length in the MySql database table, the insert will fail, this method will return false, but $wpdb->last_error will not be set to a descriptive message. You must ensure the data you wish to insert will fit in the database – do not assume the MySql will truncate the data.
If the list of crons is an instance of WP_Error, returns the instance instead of a boolean value.

If the locale is not set already, then the WPLANG constant is used if it is defined. Then it is filtered through the ‘locale’ filter hook and the value for the locale global set and the locale is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未设置区域设置，则使用WPLANG常量（如果已定义）。然后通过“语言环境”过滤器钩子对其进行过滤，并返回语言环境全局集的值和语言环境。

trans-unit.source: If the locale is set, then it will filter the locale in the ‘locale’ filter hook and return the value.

trans-unit.source: If the locale specifies that month names require a genitive case in certain formats (like ‘j F Y’), the month name will be replaced with a correct form.
trans-unit.target: 如果语言环境指定月份名称需要某些格式（例如'j F Y'）的和格，则月份名称将被替换为正确的格式。

trans-unit.source: If the locale specifies the locale month and weekday, then the locale will take over the format for the date. If it isn’t, then the date format string will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果语言环境指定了语言环境的月份和工作日，则该语言环境将取代日期的格式。如果不是，则将使用日期格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the menu doesn't exist, a callback function will fire. Default is 'wp_page_menu'. Set to false for no fallback.
If the menu doesn't exists, a callback function will fire. Default is 'wp_page_menu'. Set to false for no fallback.

trans-unit.source: If the meta field does not exist, nothing is printed.
If the meta field does not exist, the result depends on get_metadata_default(). By default, an empty string is returned if $single is true, or an empty array if it’s false.
If the meta field exists, a single value is returned if $single is true, or an array of values if it’s false.
If the meta field for the comment does not exist, it will be added.
trans-unit.target: 如果评论的元字段不存在,将被添加。

trans-unit.target: 如果该术语的元字段不存在,将被添加。

trans-unit.source: If the meta field for the user does not exist, it will be added.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户的元字段不存在,将被添加。

trans-unit.source: If the modification name does not exist, then the $default will be passed through sprintf() PHP function with the first string the template directory URI and the second string the stylesheet directory URI.
trans-unit.target: 如果修改名称不存在，则$ default将通过sprintf（） PHP函数传递，第一个字符串为模板目录URI，第二个字符串为样式表目录URI。

trans-unit.source: If the modification name does not exist, then the $default will be passed through sprintf() PHP function with the template directory URI as the first string and the stylesheet directory URI as the second string.
If the nonce value is invalid, the function will exit with an "Are You Sure?" style message.
If the number of links exceeds the amount in the administration, then the check fails. If any of the parameter contents contain any disallowed words, then the check fails.
If the number of links exceeds the amount in the administration, then the check fails. If any of the parameter contents match the blacklist of words, then the check fails.

trans-unit.source: If the option does not exist or does not have a value, then the return value will be false. This is useful to check whether you need to install an option and is commonly used during installation of plugin options and to test whether upgrading is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果该选项不存在或没有值,那么返回值将为false。这对于检查你是否需要安装一个选项很有用,在安装插件选项的过程中常用,也可以用来测试是否需要升级。

trans-unit.source: If the option does not exist, it will be created.
If the option does not exist, then the option will be added with the option value, with an $autoload value of ‘yes’.
trans-unit.target: 如果该选项不存在，则该选项将添加有选项值，且 $autoload 值为'yes'。

trans-unit.source: If the option was serialized then it will be unserialized when it is returned.

trans-unit.source: If the optional class parameter is passed to comment_class(), then that class gets added to all the others. This is useful for defining your own custom comment class.
If the original headers contain the 'Set-Cookie' key, an array containing WP_Http_Cookie objects is returned.

If the original image width or height is above the threshold, it will be scaled down. The threshold is used as max width and max height. The scaled down image will be used as the largest available size, including the _wp_attached_file post meta value.

trans-unit.source: If the path is not given then it will be the root of the plugin directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出路径,那么它将是插件目录的根目录。

trans-unit.source: If the plugin can not be written without running code within the plugin, then the plugin should create a file named ‘uninstall.php’ in the base plugin folder. This file will be called, if it exists, during the uninstallation process bypassing the uninstall hook. The plugin, when using the ‘uninstall.php’ should always check for the ‘WP_UNINSTALL_PLUGIN’ constant, before executing.
trans-unit.target: 如果在没有在插件中运行代码的情况下无法编写插件，则该插件应在基本插件文件夹中创建一个名为“ uninstall.php”的文件。如果存在该文件，则会在卸载过程中绕过卸载挂钩来调用该文件。插件在使用'uninstall.php'时，应始终在执行前检查'WP_UNINSTALL_PLUGIN'常量。

trans-unit.source: If the plugins do not redefine the functions using filters, then the default functionality will be used.
If the post ID is of an attachment, then the parent post status will be given instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果帖子ID是附件,则会给出父帖状态。

trans-unit.source: If the post categories parameter is not set, then the default category is going used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置帖子类别参数,那么将使用默认类别。

trans-unit.target: 如果帖子是受保护的,并且访问者不是管理员,那么 "受保护 "将显示在帖子标题之前。如果帖子是私人的,那么 "私人 "将位于帖子标题之前。

trans-unit.source: If the post or page is not yet modified, the modified date is the same as the creation date.
If the quicktag <!--more--> is used in a post to designate the “cut-off” point for the post to be excerpted, the_content() tag will only show the excerpt up to the
trans-unit.target: 如果帖子中使用了快速标记<！- more- >来指定要摘录的帖子的“截止”点，则the_content（）标记将仅显示摘录的内容。

trans-unit.source: If the request is a category, author, permalink or post / page, holds the corresponding ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求是类别、作者、permalink或帖子/页面,则持有相应的ID。

trans-unit.source: If the request is an OPTIONS request, the script exits with either access control headers sent, or a 403 response if the origin is not allowed. For other request methods, you will receive a return value.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求是OPTIONS请求,脚本退出时,要么发送访问控制头,要么是403响应,如果原点不允许。对于其他请求方法,你将收到一个返回值。

trans-unit.source: If the request is not already pending, it will be updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求还没有被处理,就会被更新。

trans-unit.source: If the required add_theme_support( 'post-thumbnails' ); in the current theme’s functions.php file is attached to a hook, it must be must be called before the init hook is fired. The init hook may be too late for some features. If attached to a hook, it must be after_setup_theme.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要 add_theme_support( 'post-thumbnails' ); 在当前主题的functions.php文件附加到一个钩子，它必须必须在之前调用 init 钩被激发。对于某些功能，init挂钩可能为时已晚。如果连接到挂钩，则必须为 after_setup_theme 。

trans-unit.source: If the setting already has a pre-existing value and there is no incoming post value for the setting, then this method will short-circuit since there is no change to preview.

trans-unit.source: If the site is not setup as multisite, admin_url() will be used instead.
If the site is set to display right-to-left, the RTL stylesheet link will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果网站设置为从右到左显示,将使用RTL样式表链接。

trans-unit.target: 如果该子弹未正确注册，则不会返回任何网址

If the slug was changed and not already part of the old slugs then it will be added to the post meta field (‘_wp_old_slug’) for storing old slugs for that post.
trans-unit.target: 如果该子弹已更改且不是旧子弹的一部分，则它将被添加到post meta字段（'_wp_old_slug'）中，以存储该帖子的旧子弹。

trans-unit.source: If the specified meta field does not exist for this user, an empty string is returned.

trans-unit.source: If the string doesn’t contain blocks, it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串不包含块，则返回0。

trans-unit.source: If the tag already exists, replace the existing pattern and query for that tag, otherwise add the new tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签已经存在,则替换现有模式并查询该标签,否则添加新标签。

trans-unit.source: If the tag_base property has no value, then the tag structure will have the front property value, followed by ‘tag’, and finally ‘%tag%’. If it does, then the root property will be used, along with the tag_base property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果tag_base属性没有值，则标签结构将具有front属性值，后跟'tag'，最后是'％tag％'。如果是这样，则将使用root属性以及tag_base属性值。

trans-unit.source: If the taxonomy is hierarchical, and the ‘parent’ argument is not empty, the term is inserted and the term_id will be given.
trans-unit.target: 如果分类法是分层的，并且'parent'参数不为空，则插入术语并给出term_id。

trans-unit.target: 如果该术语已经存在于相同的层次结构级别上，或者该术语slug和name不唯一，则将返回WP_Error对象。

trans-unit.source: If the term is a parent of other terms, then the children will be updated to that term’s parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果该术语是其他术语的父代，则子代将更新为该术语的父代。

trans-unit.source: If the text domain already exists, the translations will be merged. If both sets have the same string, the translation from the original value will be taken.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本域已经存在,则翻译将被合并。如果两套文本有相同的字符串,将从原始值中取译。

trans-unit.source: If the theme contains no
If the theme does not support the customize-selective-refresh-widgets feature, then this will always return an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题不支持自定义-选择-刷新-窗口功能,那么这将总是返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: If the theme is not currently active, then the base array is any stashed theme mods that were modified previously but never published.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题当前不是活动的,那么基础数组是之前修改过但从未发布过的任何隐藏的主题mods。

trans-unit.source: If the theme is published
If the theme to be previewed isn’t the active theme, add filter callbacks to swap it out at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 如果要预览的主题不是活动主题，请添加过滤器回调以在运行时将其换出。

trans-unit.source: If the third parameter of the shortcode_atts() function is present then this filter is available. The third parameter, $shortcode, is the name of the shortcode.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在shortcode_atts（）函数的第三个参数，则此过滤器可用。第三个参数$ shortcode是简码的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the title element is not part of the XML, then the default post title from the $post_default_title will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果标题元素不是XML的一部分,那么将使用$post_default_title中的默认帖子标题。

trans-unit.source: If the transient does not exist, does not have a value, or has expired, then the return value will be false.
trans-unit.target: 如果瞬态不存在,没有值,或者已经过期,那么返回值将为false。

trans-unit.source: If the user ID is not given, then the current user will be used instead. If the user ID is given, then the user data will be retrieved. The filter for the result, will also pass the original option name and finally the user data object as the third parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给定用户ID,那么将使用当前用户。如果给定了用户ID,那么将检索用户数据。结果的过滤器,也将传递原始选项名称和最后的用户数据对象作为第三个参数。

trans-unit.source: If the user can customize, the values parsed from the incoming $_POST['customized'] JSON data.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户可以自定义，则从传入的 $_POST['customized'] JSON数据中解析值。

trans-unit.source: If the user has a locale set to a non-empty string then it will be returned. Otherwise it returns the locale of get_locale().
trans-unit.target: 如果用户的语言环境设置为非空字符串，则将其返回。否则，它返回get_locale（）的语言环境。

trans-unit.source: If the value is not available it will return false.
If the wildcard_mime_types parameter is a string, it must be comma separated list. If the real_mime_types is a string, it is also comma separated to create the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果通配符_mime_types参数是一个字符串,它必须是逗号分隔的列表。如果real_mime_types是一个字符串,它也是以逗号分隔来创建列表。

trans-unit.source: If theme support for ‘widgets’ has not yet been added when this function is called, it will be automatically enabled through the use of add_theme_support()
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用此函数时尚未添加对“小部件”的主题支持，则将通过使用add_theme_support（）自动启用它

trans-unit.source: If there are no accent characters, then the string given is just returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有重音字符,那么只返回给定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If there are no meta fields, then nothing (null) will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有元字段,那么将不返回任何内容(null)。

trans-unit.source: If there are no more posts in the loop, it will trigger the loop_end action and then call call rewind_posts() method.

If there are no shortcode tags defined, then the content will be returned without any filtering. This might cause issues if a plugin is disabled as its shortcode will still show up in the post or content.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有定义任何短码标签,那么内容将不经任何过滤而返回。如果一个插件被禁用,这可能会导致问题,因为它的短码仍然会显示在帖子或内容中。

trans-unit.source: If there are no shortcode tags defined, then the content will be returned without any filtering. This might cause issues when plugins are disabled but the shortcode will still show up in the post or content.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有定义短码标签,那么内容将在没有任何过滤的情况下返回。当插件被禁用时,这可能会导致问题,但短码仍然会显示在帖子或内容中。

trans-unit.source: If you use query_posts within a template page, WordPress will have already executed the database query and retrieved the records by the time it gets to your template page (that’s how it knew which template page to serve up!). So when you over-ride the default query with query_posts(), you’re essentially throwing away the default query and its results and re-executing another query against the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在模板页面中使用query_posts，则WordPress将在进入模板页面时已经执行数据库查询并检索记录（这就是它知道要提供哪个模板页面的方式！）。因此，当您使用query_posts（）覆盖默认查询时，实际上是在丢弃默认查询及其结果，并对数据库重新执行另一个查询。
